snippet.title: Sir James Dewar
snippet.description: Sir James Dewar was the inventor of the Dewar flask \- the first thermos and the co-inventor of cordite - a smokeless gunpowder.

snippet.title: Dewar flask \- definition of Dewar flask by the Free Online Dictionary ...
snippet.description: An insulated container used especially to store liquefied gases, having a double wall with a vacuum between the walls and silvered surfaces facing the vacuum.
